title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text, data, dynamic text item.
2. Retrieve datetime values from the table and observe the format in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
